other_info: Flagging that this is a village, not a city: https://www.census2011.co.in/data/village/8686-damtal-himachal-pradesh.html

Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kala_Amb. For this it was unclear as to what the correct number is, but this because there is a village of the same name (which had ~150 people in total). But, I have put in the population of Kala Amb town here as that seemed more plausible. But, the year for this population number was unclear.

This is the population number for Sangli Miraj Kupwad municipal corporation. The Sangli Miraj Kupwad Municipal Corporation was created on 28 February 1998 by the merger of the previously separate municipal councils of Sangli, Miraj and Kupwad. In my search, I couldn't find a population number for Sangli alone.
Flagging that this is a village and there is no corresponding town or city of the same name.
*Pathankot city population. Not dera baba, not sure what they mean when they put both names in here
If both city and 'city + outgrowths' population is available, I choose 'city' population.
*This number is for the Patancheru Mandal of Medak district. This is the only Patancheru I was able to find.
*Gajraula is a Nagar Panchayat city in district of Jyotiba Phule Nagar, Uttar Pradesh. I am not sure if this is the same as the city in Amroha district.
The CPCB NCAP list, lists this as Asansol and Raniganj. But, Raniganj is a neighbourhood in Asansol, so I am listing this as Asansol.
